text: Georgios Pangalos (born 21 June 1936) is a Greek former sports shooter. He competed at the 1960, 1964 and 1968 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Greek male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Greece Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Alexandria
title: Georgios Pangalos
